name: 游戏开发的二三事
description:
It is a simulation of what a young person who wants to work in the game industry might encounter.
From nobody to a famous game producer over a period of 3 years. It is not a game company simulation, this game is more about the process of small team, from working learning, independent develop and more!

Be the new blood who is just starting out in the industry. The main purpose of this game is to complete the daily operations of eating, sleeping, exercising, and playing games to maintain the health, to finish his work while keep learning. And don't forget, make great game to make money!

From develop by yourself to develop by a team, you will meet all kinds of people. But please keep in mind, people can leave your team anytime, So don't forget keep a good relationship with your colleague. After work, you can hang around and meet people who are destined to meet you. You can either meet them by chance or you can improve their likability and dig deeper into their stories.
